title: Calm, Clever And Carefree! A Kid's Guide To Understanding Anxiety
description: Anxiety Disorders sound kind of strange and complicated, but they are really quite simple to understand once you learn what anxiety is. Kids with Anxiety Disorders are healthy and strong... they just worry and stress more than most kids. Everybody has anxiety though, so learn how to be clear minded and relaxed so you can manage your worries and stress and feel better! Now, you're on your way to being...calm, clever and carefree!
author: Tracy Bryan
